definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: At the bottom, in the left corner, there is the power inlet and the lanyard eyelet .
sentences.chinese: 在底部，在左上角，有一個電源插口和掛繩小孔。

sentences.english: I then soldered up the top and bottom of the boiler.
sentences.chinese: 當時我焊接起來的頂部和底部鍋爐。

sentences.english: Water passed through bottom discharges of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 水流通過電廠底部的泄水孔排出。

sentences.english: Why is 2 the bottom and not the rightmost vertex?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼2是底部數而不最右邊的頂點數呢？

sentences.english: The test code at the bottom then sets the value and prints out the new value.
sentences.chinese: 底部的測試代碼設置值並打印出新值。

sentences.english: Small smacks on the bottom are always a good way to start.
sentences.chinese: 小之嫌於底部，都是一個很好的方法開始。

sentences.english: The pumice flow deposit begins from its bottom, and gradually develops forward.
sentences.chinese: 堆積過程是從浮巖流底部漸進式向前堆積。

sentences.english: Make sure to stir up all the sedimentation on the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 保證引起在底部的所有沉積作用。

sentences.english: These flocs then settle to the bottom and can be removed.
sentences.chinese: 然後這些絮狀物位於底部並可以被消除。

sentences.english: Almost all the bottom of the cases were loose.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有的外箱底部都鬆了。

sentences.english: Join the top ring to the bottom ring using the two lengths of pipe as shown.
sentences.chinese: 加入頂環環的底部用管所示的兩個長度。

sentences.english: The ACL is a ligament that connects the top and bottom portions of the knee.
sentences.chinese: 前側交叉韌帶是連接膝關節頂部和底部的韌帶。

sentences.english: Much organically bound carbon is deposited on inland lake bottoms.
sentences.chinese: 大量有機結合碳沉積在內陸湖泊底部。

sentences.english: Compressing the bottom of a ceramic olive oil bottle eliminates S cracks.
sentences.chinese: 壓縮了陶瓷橄欖油瓶底部裂縫消除S。

sentences.english: The multi-language Babylon dictionary has been inserted on the translation pages at the bottom of the side menu.
sentences.chinese: 網頁底部的菜單已經裝入多語種巴比倫字典。

sentences.english: Plantar fasciitis is one of the most common causes of inferior heel pain.
sentences.chinese: 足底筋膜炎是造成足跟底部疼痛最常見的原因之一。

definition: underneath/below/the underside/world of mortals/to descend to the world of mortals (of Gods)
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
to interrogate and get to the bottom of sth
reversal/inversion/to reverse/to invert (upside down, inside out, back to front, white to black etc)
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
